A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honored the original trilogy while still taking Star Wars in a fresh direction. Humor\, though sometimes exaggerated\, never missed the mark or fell flat. Hard to know the actors portraying our heroes will be lost to us\, but it's wonderful to take a last ride with them before we can't anymore. Loved this movie\, and it left me excited for the future of the biggest part of my childhood.
